archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1000
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want to deliver offers to customers based on customer lifetime value

properties.value: [CLM] Depending on the definition of LTV it can be calculated on CLM or processed as an information from external system integrated via API/Kafka/batch and can be used to segment customers and target loyalty offers, rewards as per OOTB capability

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
